case.title: Princess wants Her Prince - 28 (Battery Park)
case.text:
Hi I am 28 and have been single for a while and looking to get back into the dating game. I am 5'8 135 brown eyes and hair. My friends would best describe me as a very ultra girly very prissy and princessy as well. I love getting dressed up and going out so a hot well dressed well mannered succesful guy is a definate turn on for me.
Plesase be well groomed white (sorry not trying to be racist) and know how to treat a lady as your Princess/Queen. Thanks and i hope to hear from my future Mr. Right soon. If you contact me please put princess desired so i can weed out spam. Thanks
